name: nvgcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))

stmt.origin: syl3an1(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2), wcel(c4, cgr))
stmt.pretty: syl3an1(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c4]c3)∈ c2, c4 ∈ GrpOp)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c4, cgr))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c4, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c4 ∈ GrpOp)
⊣ ((c4 ∈ GrpOp ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)∈ c2)

|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c4, cgr))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c4, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))

⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c4 ∈ GrpOp)
⊣ ((c4 ∈ GrpOp ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c4, cgr))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpv, c0))

|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c4, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))

-| wceq(c2, crn(c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpv, c0))
-| wceq(c2, crn(c4))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, crn(c4))

-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpv, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ c2 = ran(c4)
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c4 =(+v ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2))

comment: Closure law for the vector addition (group) operation of a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
